channel.title: CVE Feed for IETF -- RFC2003 - IP Encapsulation within IP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IETF -- RFC2003 - IP Encapsulation within IP

item.title: CVE-2020-10136|2024-09-17T00:56:11.850Z -- ietf -- rfc2003%20-%20ip%20encapsulation%20within%20ip
item.description: IP-in-IP protocol specifies IP Encapsulation within IP standard (RFC 2003, STD 1) that decapsulate and route IP-in-IP traffic is vulnerable to spoofing, access-control bypass and other unexpected behavior due to the lack of validation to verify network packets before decapsulation and routing.
